Text: RE FINAL AGENDA FOR LEGAL SIGN OFF MEETING MONDAY TH AUGUST Cc This isnt quite how I recall it looking yesterday If my memory serves me well your sketch showed all in one line You want to buy from Enron What you have sent today shows You want to buy product short description from Enron for To me this is less clear Would it not be simpler and completely unambiguous to state You want to buy from Enron product short description for Similarly You want to sell to Enron product short description for Regards Christopher Christopher Millard Clifford Chance Aldersgate Street London ECA JJ England Voice Fax Email Web Original Message From SMTP Sent Tuesday August AM To Christopher liffordChancecom Mark ECT Legal Taylor David Forster Elena Kapralova Edmund Cooper Timothy liffordChancecom Charlotte liffordChancecom Subject Re FINAL AGENDA FOR LEGAL SIGN OFF MEETING MONDAY TH AUGUST AS AGREED BY ALL OF YOU YESTERDAY see attachment Long day yesterday but thanks for everyones help I think we made a lot of progress See attached file Transaction Screendoc File Mac Word The information in this email and in any attachments is confidential and intended solely for the attention and use of the named addressees This information may be subject to legal professional or other privilege or may otherwise be protected by work product immunity or other legal rules It must not be disclosed to any person without our authority If you are not the intended recipient or a person responsible for delivering it to the intended recipient you are not authorised to and must not disclose copy distribute or retain this message or any part of it
